changes: Fixed: IPTV long disconnects (Unable to ping wireless STBs)

Fixed: Voicemail indicator occasionally not showing voicemail
Fixed: Wireless STB's not showing PVR Recordings
Fixed: STB's stuck on the FibeTV splash screen unable to lease an IP address
Fixed: Various STB Pixellation (Uh-Oh 101 Blue Screen) issues
Fixed: GUI improper detection of LAN devices
Fixed: Crashing when signing into Google Play Store
Fixed: No Signal (Black Screen) after exiting sleep mode
